body.name: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence 3.38 fl.oz 100ml, Hydrating Serum for Face with Snail Secretion Filtrate for Dull Skin & Fine Lines, Korean Skincare
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 43 mins
features: The Real Snail Essence: Formulated with 96.3% Snail Secretion Filtrate, this essence repairs and rejuvenates the skin from dryness and aging. It improves skin vitality by reducing dullness and soothing dehydrated skin.

Simple Yet Effective Light-weight Essence: A lightweight essence which fastly absorbs into the skin and gives you a natural and healthy glow. Guarantees long-lasting hydration without heavy feeling on the skin.

Key Ingredients: Snail Secretion Filtrate contains "Mucin"- an EFFECTIVE ingredient for enhanced moisturization. It instantly soothes damaged skin and delivers moisture deep into your skin. Perfect for dehydrated and damaged skin. *NO Snails are Harmed: Snail Mucin is obtained in a safe and environmentally friendly way in a favorite environment of snails and then processed as a cosmetic material. 100% Natural, Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist-tested.
Expiration Date Notice: Please be informed that the expiration date on the product is written in the South Korean format, which goes by Year/ Month/ Date (YY.MM.DD). Ex) 2024/02/13 = Feb 13th, 2024

COSRX Standards: COSRX Standards: All COSRX products are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients that alleviate irritated skin. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested, Animal Testing-FREE, Parabens-FREE, Sulfates-FREE, Phthalates-FREE Compare with similar items

Our Brand Story COSRX believes that cosmetics should give more than just outward beauty. We are devoted to enabling individuals to find solutions according to their personal skin conditions. We strive to help our customers gain self-confidence, and ultimately find their own unique beauty inside. Featured in COSRX has been featured in multiple prominent magazines and our products have received praise from many trusted editors. As proven by the countless articles that have been released, COSRX will continue to listen to the voices of our customers and strive to improve.

How is Snail Mucin obtained? Snail Mucin is obtained through placing snails in a dark and quiet environment for 30 minutes, then transferring them back to their homes. Snail Mucin is then collected and processed for cosmetic use. No snails are harmed in the process. Can this be used on sensitive skin? Based on the Skin Irritation Test (on 34 women for 48 hours), and the Human Repeat Insult Patch Test (on 53 men and women aged from 18-59), the Snail 96 Mucin Essence can be used on sensitive skin. How do I know if this product is authentic?​ To ensure the authenticity of the product, please make sure you are purchasing the product from the only authorized seller: COSRX Inc. ​The authenticity of the product cannot be promised when purchased from sellers other than COSRX Inc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A True Skin Savior
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence is an absolute game-changer in the realm of skincare, and I am beyond thrilled to share my glowing 5-star review for this Korean beauty gem.From the very first use, this essence has worked wonders on my skin. The concentration of snail secretion filtrate, a unique and standout ingredient, is nothing short of miraculous. It has completely transformed my dull complexion, leaving it radiant, plump, and incredibly hydrated.The lightweight texture of the essence is a dream to apply. It absorbs like a charm, leaving no sticky or greasy residue behind. The result is a refreshing and dewy finish that makes my skin feel revitalized and nourished.What truly sets this essence apart is its multitasking abilities. It not only addresses dullness but also tackles fine lines and wrinkles with impressive efficacy. My skin looks and feels noticeably smoother, and the overall texture has improved dramatically since incorporating this into my routine.The COSRX Snail Mucin Essence has become my go-to hydration hero. Whether used alone or as part of my multi-step Korean skincare routine, it consistently delivers outstanding results. I've noticed a significant reduction in redness and irritation, making it a holy grail for my sensitive skin.The 100ml size offers excellent value for money, considering the quality and effectiveness of the product. The sleek packaging is not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical, ensuring easy dispensing and minimal product wastage.In conclusion, if you're on the hunt for a powerhouse essence that delivers on its promises, look no further than the COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence. It's a true skin savior that has earned every bit of its 5-star rating. Korean skincare enthusiasts, rejoice – this essence is an absolute must-have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Year with COSRX Snail Mucin Essence: The Botox in a Bottle for Radiant Skin
reviews.reviewText: After a full year of integrating COSRX Snail Mucin Essence into my skincare routine, I can wholeheartedly say it's like discovering 'Botox in a bottle'. This product is a marvel in skin transformation, delivering results that are nothing short of miraculous.Texture & Absorption:Its feather-light texture is a dream to apply, sinking into the skin instantly without any sticky aftermath. It's akin to giving your skin a refreshing, hydrating splash, perfect for any time of the day.Hydration & Moisture:As a hydration hero, this essence locks in moisture, leaving my skin plump and dewy. It's an oasis for the skin, ensuring lasting softness and suppleness, even in the driest of environments.Soothing & Calming:Redness and irritation have significantly diminished, thanks to its calming properties. For anyone struggling with sensitivity or post-acne marks, this essence is a true game-changer, offering gentle yet effective relief.Brightening & Smoothing:Over the course of the year, I've witnessed a noticeable improvement in my skin's brightness and texture. My complexion now radiates a youthful glow, and those fine lines have become far less conspicuous.Ingredients & Formulation:Snail mucin, the essence's key ingredient, is a treasure trove of skin-loving nutrients like hyaluronic acid and glycolic acid. COSRX's commitment to simplicity and effectiveness shines through in this formulation, making it a safe haven for sensitive skin types.Versatility & Compatibility:Its compatibility with other skincare products is remarkable. It layers seamlessly under serums, moisturizers, and sunscreen, proving to be an adaptable and essential part of any skincare regimen.Final Thoughts:A year into using the COSRX Snail Mucin Essence, it has firmly established itself as a non-negotiable in my daily routine. My skin has never looked better – hydrated, radiant, and healthy. For anyone on the fence, this essence is not just a promise; it's a guarantee of transformed, rejuvenated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the change in my skin!
reviews.reviewText: I am prefacing this by saying that I am 46, and have oily, large pores, with some texture. I purchased this after a lot of research into this product and saying that it could help with texture. I had first was nervous because I do have very oily skin and I was afraid that it was going to produce a lot of oil during the day as many skin care products do.I wanted to write this review after a few weeks of using this because I didn’t want to give my initial reaction. However, this has stayed the same for my skin so now I will tell you.I spray my face with a little water, use 2 pumps, and press it into my skin after cleansing. I then follow up with a moisturizer. I use this in the morning.I have noticed that my skin is producing a lot less oil, and it is a lot more controlled than before. I guess because this is giving me the moisture knees as opposed to my skin over producing the oil during the day. I have noticed a definite change in the texture of my skin. It is a lot smoother, brighter, and I noticed I am not getting any reaction from the serum. I even noticed that during my hormonal breakouts they were Less than if I did not use this product. I have also noticed a reduction in the visibility of my pores, and I can’t believe that I have actually gotten compliments on my skin a few days after using it.I don't notice any smell and the texture of the product does not gross me out.So if you have skin like me, give this a try.

Siempre hay que tener la cara húmeda al aplicar este tipo de productos. Si retarda su absorbcion pero asegura la hidratación y que no se irrite la piel. En este producto. es mejor aplicar 1-2 pumps. En lo particular a mi sí me gusta la consistencia de babita-gel jaja, siento que es más hidratante que los serums demasiado líquidos. Es un buen producto, worth the hype.
Muito caro e deu resultados iguais a um produto barato da farmácia brasileira
